channel.title: News on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in News on PacoChan's Website

item.title: Messing around with a Bluetooth printer
item.description: I recently acquired one of these thermal printers to be able to print small labels quickly. And since I didn’t find any open source alternative that would work for me, I wanted to try to do my own program as a fun challenge.

item.title: Finished a Perfect Dark save editor
item.description: Being my favorite game, I had long wanted to make a Perfect Dark save editor. Mainly to see and understand what information is hidden inside a save file.

item.title: New comments system
item.description: After renovating the site a few months ago I mentioned that I wasn’t sure how to implement the comments system, since the site is now totally static. After a lot of research and trying different solutions, I ended up using a selfhosted comments system called Remark42.

item.title: Added Resident Evil - Text Adventure
item.description: If you have played and completed Without Escape, you may have seen in the extras section an option called Background where I explain where the idea of making the game initially came from.

item.title: Finished a Banjo-Kazooie save editor
item.description: As I mentioned when I finished my Super Mario 64 save editor, I was interested in making one for Banjo-Kazooie.

item.title: Finished a Super Mario 64 save editor
item.description: Time ago I did a save editor for Super Mario 64, but it was exclusive for Windows and I never published it. I decided to rewrite it from scratch, improve it, and make it cross-platform.

item.title: A decade later... new website... again
item.description: There was a time when I used to express myself more often on the internet, and I’ve had multiple websites throughout the years where I posted the projects I was doing or collaborating on.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie Editor version 1.4
item.description: I’ve made another update to the editor. The main chage is that the program is able to import correctly TGA files with modified resolution.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie Editor version 1.3
item.description: I’ve made another update to the editor. The main chage is that the big font used in some menus of the game is now editable.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie Editor version 1.2
item.description: This time I’ve made a very interesting update to the editor.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie Spanish translation update
item.description: After four years since the release of the first version, here’s an update.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie Editor version 1.1
item.description: I’ve updated this program because one user found a problem while editing the font.

item.title: New website... again!
item.description: I don’t know if you have noticed some subtle changes to the site.

item.title: Finished Mario Party translation
item.description: Yup, the translation has finally been finished.

item.title: I have finally finished Without Escape
item.description: After five years or so, I have finally finished the damn game.

item.title: Music added
item.description: I have added songs to the Music section, which it was empty up until now.

item.title: New title for the website
item.description: It’s been some days that I’ve been thinking for a new name for the website, since I didn’t like PacoChan’s Software.

item.title: ¡New website!
item.description: You might have not noticed, but I’ve done some subtle changes to the website.

item.title: Updated the Without Escape page
item.description: I have resumed the project after a long time doing nothing with it.

item.title: First update
item.description: I have updated the Tales of Eternia translation page.

item.title: Opening of PacoChan's Software
item.description: It’s been some time since I thought of having a website to be able to publish all the things I do and… here it is.
